cast.overview: As a 13-year-old, fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.
cast.title: Atonement

cast.overview: Since the moment they met at age 5, Rosie and Alex have been best friends, facing the highs and lows of growing up side by side. A fleeting shared moment, one missed opportunity, and the decisions that follow send their lives in completely different directions. As each navigates the complexities of life, love, and everything in between, they always find their way back to each other - but is it just friendship, or something more?
cast.title: Love, Rosie

details.biography: Jamie Beamish was born on September 9, 1976 in Waterford, Ireland. He is an actor, known for Bridgerton (2020), Derry Girls (2018) and Extra Ordinary (2019).
details.name: Jamie Beamish
